Text:
Thanks for the Countdown torrents! 

I have a question. I have been trying watch the your Countdown shows on Roku via Rocksbox. The file format is fine, but when I play the file in Rocksbox, the file cuts out at the opening. I have used Handbrake to try and get it to work, but compressing it again causes the audio to be out of sync. 

Are there better setting in Handbrake I could use that would get the file to work? Is it possible to upload a less compressed MP4 version of Countdown?

I too would again like to thank tbb for uploading these files. It is REALLY helpful for those of us who live on other continents (e.g., Europe) and who have absolutely no way of subscribing to Current TV.

The final segment of this program was very glitchy in this torrent, with much of the dialog missing.

That segment was...
Topic: HBO movie "Game Change," about Sarah Palin, with Julianne Moore
Guest: JC Coccoli, comedian

A complete version of that segment is available at http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7054456

nahoowey: If you've already followed the instructions at...
http://roksbox.com/home/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=55&Itemid=55
...without success, then I think you'll need to contact tech support at Roksbox or Roku.

FYI: I just successfully played this mp4 file on my Win7 machine with VLC, WMP, RealPlayer, and QuickTime.
